items.title: UM4 4-slot
items.info: Input: DC 5V/2A 9V/2A 18W (MAX) • Automatic and High-Speed Charging • Real-time Information Display • Energy Saving Function • Charges 4 Li-ion Batteries Independently

items.title: Intellicharger i4
items.info: Input: AC 100~240V or 10W DC 9-12V • 1.5A Shared Charge Rate • Li-ion, IMR, LiFePO4, NiMH, NiCd • Charges 4 mixed batteries simultaneously

items.title: Intellicharger Ui2
items.info: Input: AC 100~240V or 8W DC 9-12V • 1A Shared Charge Rate • Li-ion, IMR, LiFePO4, NiMH, NiCd • Charges 2 mixed batteries simultaneously

items.title: Needle 4
items.info: Input: USB DC 5V/2A • 0.5Ax4 charge rate • Li-ion, IMR, LiFePO4

items.title: Needle 1
items.info: Input: USB DC 5V/1A • 0.5Ax1 charge rate • Li-ion, IMR, LiFePO4

items.title: Needle 2
items.info: Input: USB DC 5V/1A • 0.5Ax2 charge rate • Li-ion, IMR, LiFePO4
